Title: Server classes and resources exposure in OSGi applications using Vaadin 12-14 and 19
Description:
Vulnerability in OSGi integration in `com.vaadin:flow-server` versions 1.2.0 through 2.4.7 (Vaadin 12.0.0 through 14.4.9), and 6.0.0 through 6.0.1 (Vaadin 19.0.0) allows attacker to access application classes and resources on the server via crafted HTTP request.

- https://vaadin.com/security/cve-2021-31407
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 12.0.0 before 14.4.10, version 19.0.0
NotImpacted: All versions before 12.0.0, all versions starting from 14.4.10 before 19.0.0, all versions after 19.0.0
